Interview With The Vampire (The Vampire Chronicles #1)

Here are the confessions of a vampire. Hypnotic, shocking, and chillingly erotic, this is a novel of mesmerizing beauty and astonishing forceâ€”a story of danger and flight, of love and loss, of suspense and resolution, and of the extraordinary power of the senses.
